name: Chesnaught
description: Its Tackle is forceful enough to flip a 50-ton tank. It shields its allies from danger with its own body.

abilities.name: Overgrow
abilities.effect: When this Pokémon has 1/3 or less of its HP remaining, its grass-type moves inflict 1.5× as much regular damage.
abilities.description: Ups GRASS moves in a pinch.

abilities.name: Bulletproof
abilities.effect: Protects against bullet, ball, and bomb-based moves.
abilities.description: Protects the Pokémon from some ball and bomb moves.
